repl_description:
An encrypted registry database web application built with Flask and Vanilla JS, featuring overlap detection and notification capabilities. The application includes an analytics dashboard providing comprehensive reporting metrics, including perpetrator tracking with contact details (email, phone, social media), overlap statistics, and temporal pattern analysis through weekly trends and hourly distributions.

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Flask
- Frontend: Vanilla JavaScript
- Core Features: Encryption, Registry Database, Overlap Detection, Notifications
- Analytics: Dashboard, Trend Visualization, Statistical Reporting
- Data Collection: Contact Details (Email, Phone, X/Twitter, Telegram)
- Deployment: PWA-enabled, Mobile-responsive design
